Civic Tech as a Movement with Dawn McDougall 🏛

Nov 21, 2018

  • civictech
  • episode
  • movement
  • philadelphia
  • community organizing

This episode features Dawn McDougall, Senior Advisor and former Executive Director of Code for Philly. We hop into a discussion about what it means for Civic Tech to be a movement and we gain some insight into how Code for Philly does community organizing.
